scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development && npm run start2:part1 && npm run dev:part2
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=production && npm ci && npm run start2:part1 && next build
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=production && npm run start2
scripts.test: npm run cypress & npm run start:test
scripts.start:test: export NODE_ENV=test APP_ENV=test && npm run clean && npm run start2
scripts.start2: npm run start2:part1 && npm run start2:part2
scripts.start2:part2: ts-node --project=tsconfig2.json scripts/entrypoint.ts & next build && next start
scripts.start:no-build: npm run start2:part1 && ts-node --project=tsconfig2.json scripts/entrypoint.ts & next start
scripts.clean: rm -f tsconfig2.tsbuildinfo; rm -f tsconfig3.tsbuildinfo; rm -f test.db; rm -rf ./scripts/data; rm -rf ./players; rm -rf ./.next/cache/images
